name: React Weather App
description: A weather Application using the OpenWeather API to get a Five Day Average Weather Forecast for some of your Favourite Cities in the US.

name: YouTube Search App - Tube-5
description: A Simple App(Tube-5) to search for YouTube videos using React and Redux and the Youtube API. A rather faster Search as compared to Youtube.com. Partly due to the fact that it brings out the Top 5 Matches.

name: Student Resource App
description: Built with NodeJs and MongoDB as a prerequisite to being accepted into the Andela and Google Learning Community 2.0 Intermediate Web Track. Functionality: CRUD, Authentication and Authorization.

name: Landing page
description: A highly responsive and mobile friendly landing page for a rehabilitation/mental clinic. Built on the back of modern technology; HTML5, CSS3, bootstrap, jQuery. Find a link as hosted with netlify below.

name: Portfolio Page
description: Portfolio page Interface built for a Member of the House Representatives, 8th Nigerian National Assembly. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript.

name: React Recipe App
description: A basic react application. Getting my feet wet on how to manage state in React.

name: Liberty therapies
description: Built this responsive website with a blog attached for liberty therapies Using GatsbyJs. Still being worked on but live in the link below
